[Conrasu Weapon Understanding](/Feats.aspx?ID=2782) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conrasu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=343" />

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 109 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have come to know conrasu weapons as you know yourself. Whenever you critically hit using a [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75), [glaive](/Weapons.aspx?ID=20), [longspear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=6), [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31), [shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77), [spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10), or a [conrasu](/Traits.aspx?ID=343) weapon, you apply the weapon's [critical specialization effect](/Rules.aspx?ID=235).
